item.title: Driver
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Transporting finished goods and raw materials over land to and from manufacturing plants or retail and distribution centers. Inspecting vehicles for mechanical and safety issues and perform preventative maintenance. Planning routes and meeting delivery schedules. Securing certain paperwork for said routes

The post Driver appeared first on DMWORLD.
item.content:encoded:
• Transporting finished goods and raw materials over land to and from manufacturing plants or retail and distribution centers.
  • Inspecting vehicles for mechanical and safety issues and perform preventative maintenance.
  • Planning routes and meeting delivery schedules. Securing certain paperwork for said routes
